name: 64 FISTS
description:
64 FISTS

So here it is!
64 FISTS is a tiny beat 'em up game created during the #LOWREZJAM 2017. The game is
mostly inspired by games like Battletoads & Double Dragon as well as classic
beat 'em up games by Capcom and Konami. The game features three different
levels... with pretty much the same set of enemies :)

CONTROLS:

Try gamepad! That's right, even in the browser!

, , , , A, D, W, S - Control movement
Z, X, C, ENTER - Action (punch during the game or use a menu item)

If you absolulely hate this configuration you can change it in a native build: navigate to the folder where the game is located and edit the `bindings.json` file inside the `config` folder. Note for Mac users: right-click on the game application and choose "Show package contents". Then navigate to `Contents/Resources/config` and do descibed above.
